title: saraNam saraNam enDraanE
sahitya:
sharaNam sharaNam enRaanE-KaaVade viTTaal

tiraNam allavO naan daane



anupallavi



Ariya vibheeshaNan ange arakkan aanaalum enge

eru sevi kETka vaayviTTu raaghava enru

kooppiTTu



caraNam



shankaraabhayam AnRane MaarkaNtan avan

Pongiya Kalanai venRane

Vagaiyo eedhennaveeriyum Maruthi chonnade Kariyum

angavan vandhennai meva azhaittu vaa po Sugreeva
